name: Off The Hats
description:
What Happens When you Give a Dumbass 72 Hours to Make a Video Game?!
You Get "Off The Hats"! 

You've spent your entire life attempting to craft the best hat of 'em all! and you've done it, after Decades of Sleepless Nights and Work , You Crafted the Mega golden Hat of Destiny! but to your dismay, Bobby has Sabotaged your Work and Stolen the Hat and is planning to use the power of the Hat to Destroy Earth the Universe, Stop at Nothing as you fight his minions and bad guys to take back what was once yours, Drink your Milk to Heal up Load your Banana Gun and Get to Work and when i say get to work, Do you have what it takes to Defeat Bobby and Save the Universe?!

[This Game is Pretty Short and not very good as it was made in a short amount of Time]
